about_the_game:
Hello everyone! We are proud to announce that our tower defense game 'Moonlight' has now landed on the Steam platform!
In this game, you will have a special forces team, each equipped with unique skills:

X-G-P: Responsible for attacking and eliminating enemies.

J-S-G: responsible for slowing down enemy speed, creating chaos, and being able to release toxic gas.

S-A-B: Responsible for collecting energy.

L-E-S: Although it cannot kill enemies, it can cause permanent damage to them.

K-T-C: It can launch a tracker, which can double the attack power of other weapons and is an efficient tool for assisting and killing enemies.

The purpose of this game is "you need to kill the enemy near S-A-B to gain energy". This may seem simple, but it requires a reasonable combination of each weapon to achieve it, which is very challenging.
Our development team has been constantly striving and improving to make this game better. Before the game was released, we conducted extensive game testing to enable us to make necessary improvements and adjustments to improve the quality and fun of the game.
We firmly believe that Moonlight is an excellent tower defense game, and we hope that players can try new challenges and stories through this game, and enjoy a new gaming experience.
Thank you for your support!
detailed_description:
Hello everyone! We are proud to announce that our tower defense game 'Moonlight' has now landed on the Steam platform!
In this game, you will have a special forces team, each equipped with unique skills:

X-G-P: Responsible for attacking and eliminating enemies.

J-S-G: responsible for slowing down enemy speed, creating chaos, and being able to release toxic gas.

S-A-B: Responsible for collecting energy.

L-E-S: Although it cannot kill enemies, it can cause permanent damage to them.

K-T-C: It can launch a tracker, which can double the attack power of other weapons and is an efficient tool for assisting and killing enemies.

The purpose of this game is "you need to kill the enemy near S-A-B to gain energy". This may seem simple, but it requires a reasonable combination of each weapon to achieve it, which is very challenging.
Our development team has been constantly striving and improving to make this game better. Before the game was released, we conducted extensive game testing to enable us to make necessary improvements and adjustments to improve the quality and fun of the game.
We firmly believe that Moonlight is an excellent tower defense game, and we hope that players can try new challenges and stories through this game, and enjoy a new gaming experience.
Thank you for your support!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires an Apple processor
  • OS: Ventura 13
  • Processor: Apple M1
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires an Apple processor
  • OS: Ventura 13
  • Processor: Apple M1
  • Memory: 32 MB RAM
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

name: MoonBeam

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: win7/win10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6400 or AMD FX 8320
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960 or AMD Radeon R9 280
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: win7/win10
  • Processor: intel core i7-7700
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 6GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Here's a special forces team for you, they all have unique skills. Your task is to make the enemy die in a designated place. Get more energy.
